name: Time Attack! (itaypoo)
description:
if you are a streamer playing my game, I would love it if you tagged me in the jam's discord! @itaypoo

(Controls also available ingame)

Welcome! The controls are simple: move with WASD, and attack with the left mouse button. Dodge with the shift button.

 Dodging through enemies will hurt them and fill up your boost bar. Once it is full, you will get an HP point and a small boost of speed

Killing enemies will grant you +1 second. Once the timer reaches 0 or you have lost all your health points, you lose!

Good luck! :)

made with Godot Game Engine. Sounds made with SFXR and background music is taken from zapsplat .com
